name: Cubes'Game
description:
Puzzle with cubes made on Unity.

Your main task is to bring the green cube to the exit by moving the other cubes around it. The further you go, the more new mechanics and levels become more difficult. Expect a large number of updates and additions, the game is still developing.

Development team:

Mian programmer/game designer - Moiseev Ivan

Sprite creator - Klyukin Yurii ( https://instagram.com/klyukinru?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=)
